00031 /* Logging verbosity is between 0 and 5. */
00032 
00034 #define GT_ERROR 0 
00035 
00036 #define GT_NOTICE 1 
00037

00039 
00040 #define GT_ACTION 3 
00041 
00042 #define GT_DEBUG 4 
00043 
00044 #define GT_TRACE 5
